comments.comments_text: Manchester Utd force their opponents to concede a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] force their opponents to concede a corner.

comments.comments_text: Taiwo Awoniyi (Nottingham) gets in a good position after an exceptional individual run and releases a powerful shot that flies precisely into the bottom left corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gets in a good position after an exceptional individual run and releases a powerful shot that flies precisely into the bottom left corner.

comments.comments_text: Willy Boly (Nottingham) gets to the ball inside the penalty area and produces a bullet header towards the goal. He aims his effort nicely into the top right corner, leaving Andre Onana helpless. He makes it 0:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gets to the ball inside the penalty area and produces a bullet header towards the goal. He aims his effort nicely into the top right corner, leaving [PLAYER] helpless. He makes it 0:2.

comments.comments_text: The referee points to the corner flag and Manchester Utd will take a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee points to the corner flag and [TEAM] will take a corner.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Christian Eriksen (Manchester United) takes a short pass from Marcus Rashford in his stride in the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes an unstoppable shot inside the right post. 1:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes a short pass from [PLAYER] in his stride in the box, jinks inside his man and unleashes an unstoppable shot inside the right post. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: Bruno Fernandes (Manchester United) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) looks like he will be the one to take the corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Morgan Gibbs-White (Nottingham) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders.

comments.comments_text: Manchester Utd can’t profit from the corner as the defence clear the ball upfield.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] can’t profit from the corner as the defence clear the ball upfield.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Serge Aurier (Nottingham) was quite harsh and Stuart Attwell didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Morgan Gibbs-White (Nottingham) argues strongly with the referee and is awarded a yellow card. A needless yellow card!
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) argues strongly with the referee and is awarded a yellow card. A needless yellow card!

comments.comments_text: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Erik ten Hag probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Raphael Varane (Manchester United). He is replaced by Victor Lindelof.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. [PLAYER] probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of [PLAYER] ([TEAM]). He is replaced by [PLAYER].

comments.comments_text: Goal! Bruno Fernandes manages to prod the ball to Casemiro (Manchester United) after a melee inside the box, and he needs no second invitation to slot the ball into the bottom left corner. 2:2.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Goal! [PLAYER] manages to prod the ball to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) after a melee inside the box, and he needs no second invitation to slot the ball into the bottom left corner. 2:2.

comments.comments_text: The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Manchester Utd.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: A cross from a corner kick by Manchester Utd is too strong and the ball goes well out of play.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A cross from a corner kick by [TEAM] is too strong and the ball goes well out of play.

comments.comments_text: Manchester Utd have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

comments.comments_text: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Moussa Niakhate (Nottingham) comes onto the pitch for Scott McKenna.

comments.comments_text: Today's referee Stuart Attwell rightly decides to book Ola Aina (Nottingham) for his harsh tackle.

comments.comments_text: Joe Worrall (Nottingham) takes out his opponent with a nasty slide tackle and receives a straight red card from the referee!

comments.comments_text: Bruno Fernandes (Manchester United) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence. The ball is out of play. A goal-scoring opportunity from a corner for Manchester Utd.
